title: না, গুগল সিইও সুন্দর পিচাই ভারতে ভোট দিতে আসেননি

vclaim: Also got to visit my alma mater (and old dorm room!) for the first time in 23 years. Thanks to everyone @IITKgp for the warm welcome! pic.twitter.com/OUn7mlKGI7
